fields.label: Please provide a title or description of the document to be signed

page.title: Send to Jim and Jack for signature

notes.noteHtml: WF created and maintained by Amber Luu
notes.noteString: WF created and maintained by Amber Luu

config.body:
Hi Jim,


Please click on the link below to review the document (<%- Title %>) prior to sending to Jack for signature. Here are notes from <%- Preparer_Name %>:

<%- Preparer_Notes %>


Once you click "approve", you will have the ability to enter comments for Jack to see prior to him signing the document.


VIEW DOCUMENT

Once you click VIEW DOCUMENT, you may use the download button in the top right corner to download and print.
config.subject: You have a document to review - "<%= Title %>"

blocks.text: Hi Jim,

​Preparer_Notes​
Once you click "approve", you will have the ability to enter comments for Jack to see prior to him signing the document.
VIEW TASK
Once you click VIEW DOCUMENT, you may use the download button in the top right corner to download and print.

config.body:
Jim approved. Please prepare the doc for Jack and <%- Additional_Signer_Name %>'s signature.

The first link will ask you to place fields on the document for Jack and then the next page will ask you to place the fields for <%- Additional_Signer_Name %>.


PREPARE DOC
config.subject: Jim approved "<%= Title %>" for Jack and <%= Additional_Signer_Name %>'s signature.
